permission_denied_error_message_with_lab: Check your system settings to make sure that {{label, lowercase}} access is available
discrad_screen_record_content: Are you sure you want to discard current recording and start over?
max_one_video_in_workbook: Maximum of 1 video is allowed in one page
max_one_video_with_label: Maximum of 1 {{label, lowercase}} video is allowed in workbook
upload_wait_error: We’re uploading your workbook, this can take few minutes
wait_until_upload_error: If you keep seeing this message, check your internet connection to make sure you're still online.
max_num_page_with_label: Maximum of {{label}} pages are allowed in workbook
max_pages_error_decription_with_label: Cannot add more than {{label}} pages in a single workbook.
update_device_to_version_lable: Please update your device to version {{label, lowercase}}
update_to_latest_version: Please update your device to latest version.
ios_rec_is_supported_from_and_update_fea: {{feature}} recording is not available for your device. Please update your iOS or use a device with iOS {{label, lowercase}} or higher
upate_app_version: Please update your app to latest version from google playstore
take_photo_not_supported_in_device_versi: Taking a photo from your camera is not available for your device. Please update this device's iOS or use a device with iOS {{label, lowercase}} or higher.
connect_google_before_use: Please, connect your google account before accessing drive
functionality_unsupported_browser: This functionality is currently not supported by your browser. Please use {{label}} instead.
attachment_size_exceeds_msg_with_label: Attachment size exceeds the allowable limit of {{label}}
discard_feedback_warning_msg: All changes will be lost. Are you sure you want to proceed?
resume_your_work_msg: You have an unsaved work, would you like to continue where you left?
ios_15_screen_recornd_not_supported_mess:
Please use a desktop or Android device to use this functionality.

Apple team introduced a bug with the iOS 15 update. We have reported this issue to Apple and our friends at Apple are working really hard to resolve this.

Thank you for understanding
exit_recording_confirmation: Are you sure you want to exit recording? This will erase your progress.
exit_without_save_prompt: Do you want to exit without saving changes?
pointer_tool_toast_msg: Click and drag the pointer tool to use
add_audio_not_available: Add audio isn’t available during screen recording
restart_recording_confirmation: Are you sure you want to restart this recording? This action cannot be undone.
delete_workbook_confirmation: This workbook will be permanently deleted. Would you like to continue?
erase_changes_confirmation: All changes made to this workbook will be erased. Would you like to continue?
continue_where_left: Would you like to continue where you left?
max_video_limit_reached: Video limit reached. Only one video can be added in a page.
save_template_note: Please note that all teachers will be able to view and use this template from the Workbook library. Only you and school admins can edit the original template.
template_name_exists: Template name already exists. Please choose a different name
sure_want_to_delete_template_with_label: Are you sure you want to delete the ‘{{label}}’ template? This will remove it from the Workbook library section for all teachers. This action cannot be undone.
no_school_templates_created: No school templates have been created yet. Create a new blank workbook or reset your filters.
crop_toast_message: Drag the resize handles or click on the slider to crop the image
school_not_added_any_templates: Your school has not added any templates. Start by creating a new blank workbook!
no_school_templates_match_filters: There are no school templates that match the selected filters. Create a new blank workbook or adjust your filters.
no_templates_matching_your_search: There are no templates matching your search and filters. Try a different keyword or filter selection
page_limit_reached_error_with_label: Page limit reached. You can only add up to {{label}} pages per workbook.
pages_limit_error_decription_with_label: You can only add up to {{label}} pages per workbook
